item.description:
Blackstone Valley Outfitters are highly knowledgeable outdoor enthusiasts of our area and offer a variety of rentals, tours, equipments, lessons and more!

Join me for a day of Kayaking (no experience necessary) along the Blackstone River. We will go for as long as everyone likes, but taking advantage of our full day rentals. For those who have Kayaks, your welcome to bring along.

Be sure to bring sunscreen and sunglasses. We can bring small coolers with beverages and snack for along the route "rest-stops". Other than that your welcome to bring anythiing you don't mind getting wet - just precautionary.

I've slotted us for 10 people, plus whomever have their own kayaks - so you committed YES RSVP is needed.

I will be in touch a week prior to confirm who is bringing what for the cooler so we are covered.

Rental Cost
$35 single kayak
$45 tandum kayak

Directions
From Route 295 take Exit 10 and head south on Route 122 (Mendon Road) in Cumberland. Continue on Route 122 for 3.1 miles and crossing the Blackstone River. Turn at next right Cook Street (Lincoln Car Wash at corner) Cook Street turns into Carrington Street, take right at our sign we are located in the Ryco Building.

Rain Date 7/5
item.name: Kayak Day Trip
